quotes.quote: Be gentle, kind and beautiful, yet firm and strong, both mentally and physically.
It's important for us to be kind to other people and treat other people the way that we want to be treated.
Being kind is more important than being right.
You must be kind to others. You must foster a caretaker personality of gentleness and perseverance, even in the midst of adversity.
A gentle focus of attention is all it takes to free the body of minor imbalances.
Be gentle and forgiving with yourself, abandon any and all shame, and refuse to engage in any self-repudiation.
The gentle minde by gentle deeds is knowne.
A gentle answer turns away wrath, but a harsh word stirs up anger.
Wherever there is a human being, there is an opportunity for a kindness.
A gentle word, a kind look, a good-natured smile can work wonders and accomplish miracles.
Let the gentle bush dig its root deep and spread upward to split the boulder.
The one good thing about being kind of shy is that nobody bugs you when you want to be left alone.
Human kindness has never weakened the stamina or softened the fiber of a free people. A nation does not have to be cruel to be tough.
Do not go gentle into that good night but rage, rage against the dying of the light.
Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a battle you know nothing about.
Sometimes its not the strength but gentleness that cracks the hardest shells.
It is not whether your words or actions are tough or gentle; it is the spirit behind your actions and words that announces your inner state.
Kindness is the evidence of greatness. If anyone is glad that you are here, then you have not lived in vain.
A kind heart speaks kind words.
Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
Nothing is so strong as gentleness, nothing so gentle as real strength.
A gentle heart is tied with an easy thread.
Laws too gentle are seldom obeyed; too severe, seldom executed.
Modesty: the gentle art of enhancing your charm by pretending not to be aware of it.
Be gentle and kind all the time.
Choose being kind over being right and you'll be right every time.
Gentle time will heal our sorrows.
Courage. Kindness. Friendship. Character. These are the qualities that define us as human beings, and propel us, on occasion, to greatness.
Kindness to self will put you in the perfect attitude and position to be kind to others.
Kindness is the best prayer.
Only the gentle are ever really strong.
You cannot do a kindness too soon, for you never know how soon it will be too late.
